form.label: CM - Analysis
form.description: Analysis Dashboard for FireEye CM Events

search.query: eventtype=fe product="CMS" $wild$ | eval UrlHash=case (category=="malware-object",file_hash, category=="web-infection", objURL, category=="malware-callback" OR category=="domain-match",infURL)| sort -occurred | table source, sourcetype, category, id, signature, severity, occurred, transport, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, UrlHash | rename category AS Type, id AS ID, signature AS Malware, severity AS Severity, occurred AS Occurred, transport AS Protocol, src_ip AS "Source IP", src_port AS "Source Port", dest_ip AS "Target IP", dest_port AS "Target Port", UrlHash AS "URL/Md5sum", locations as "Location"
eventtype=fe product="CMS" id=$ID$ $wild$ | table _raw, ext_ref | rename _raw AS "Raw Event", ext_ref AS "Event Link"

eventtype=fe product="CMS" category="domain-match" $wild$ | stats count(infURL) as "Events", distinct_count(src_ip) as "Hosts", max(occurred) as "Last Seen" by infURL | table infURL, locations, Events, Hosts, "Last Seen" | rename infURL as "C&C Server", locations as "Locations" | sort â€“"Last Seen"

eventtype=fe product="CMS" $wild$ | eval file_hash = coalesce(file_hash,malware_url) | sort -occurred | table source, sourcetype, id, signature, severity, occurred, suser, duser, file_hash | rename id AS ID, signature AS Malware, severity AS Severity, occurred AS Occurred, duser AS Recipient, suser AS Sender, file_hash AS "URL/Md5sum", locations as "Location"

eventtype=fe product="CMS" $wild$ | stats count(duser), count(file_hash), count(request), max(signature), max(occurred) by duser | rename duser AS Recipient, count(duser) as "Total Malicious Email", count(file_hash) AS "Attachment", count(request) AS URL, max(signature) AS "Last Malware", max(occurred) AS "Last Seen at (UTC)"

eventtype=fe product="CMS" $wild$ | stats dc(duser), count(duser), count(file_hash), count(request), max(signature), max(occurred) by suser | rename suser AS Sender, dc(duser) AS "Unique Recipient", count(duser) as "Total Malicious Email", count(file_hash) AS "Attachment", count(request) AS URL, max(signature) AS "Last Malware", max(occurred) AS "Last Seen at (UTC)"
